description: Sectoral Phase-out Plan for Elimination of Chloro Fluoro Carbons  in the Foam Sector in India

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Achieve complete phase-out of Chloro Flouro Carbons in the Foam Sector in India by end-2006, enable India to meet its obligations of phased Ozone Depleting Substance reductions in accordance with the control schedule of the Montreal Protocol and to ensure timely, sustainable and cost-effective Chloro Flouro Carbons phase-out in the Foam Sector, through development and implementation of a combination of investment, technical support and management components.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Phase out Chloro Flouro Carbon

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development

title: Phase-out Plan for elimination of Chloro Fluoro Carbon
